snippet.title: Chernobylite Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
☢️🙂☢️ Support us on KICKSTARTER! ☢️🙂☢️ 
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/thefarm51/chernobylite-survival-horror-in-3d-scanned-chernob?ref=7cffl2

Add the game to your wishlist - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1016800
Get the daily pics on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chernobylite/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ChernobyliteGame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ChernobylGame
VK: https://vk.com/chernobylitegame
Discord: https://discord.gg/mehRmzY 

"It’s not about how you face your fears. It’s about how you survive them." Chernobylite is a science-fiction survival horror experience, mixing the free exploration of its disturbing world with challenging combat, unique crafting, and non-linear storytelling. Try to survive and reveal the twisted secrets of Chernobyl in the 3D-scanned recreation of the real Exclusion Zone. 

More info about the game - www.chernobylgame.com

Add the game to your Wishlist - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1016800
